          <title>
            <string language="sl">Asociacije</string>
            <string language="en">Associations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verbindungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Associations</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Associazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενώσεις</string>

          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kratka vaja za brušenje možganov na začetku ali na koncu ure. V začetku so težave: učenci so še vedno pri iskanju asociacije na prejšnjo besedo, nekateri se sploh ne spomnijo ničesar, vendar se, če igrico večkrat ponavljamo, hitro navadijo. In potem se bliska</string>
            <string language="en">Short exercise for brainstorming - exchanging associations between students.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="sl">asociacija</string>
            <string language="en">association</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurze Übung für Geistesstörung - Austauschen 
von von Verbindungen zwischen Kursteilnehmern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Exercice court pour la séance de réflexion - 
permuter des associations entre les étudiants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Exercício curto para o brainstorming - trocando 
associações entre estudantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esercitazione corta per "brainstorming" - 
scambiare le associazioni fra gli allievi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομη άσκηση για το "brainstorming" - που 
ανταλλάσσει τις ενώσεις μεταξύ των σπουδαστών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ejercicio corto para la reunión de reflexión - 
intercambiar asociaciones entre los estudiantes.</string>
          </description>
